programme.title: Bruce Lee's Hardest Hits
programme.desc: These are the films that made Bruce Lee the greatest martial artist in Hollywood history.

programme.title: The Tattoo Connection
programme.desc: Martial arts legend Jim Kelly stars as a former CIA agent sent to investigate a diamond theft in Hong Kong. As he makes his way through the city’s dangerous underworld, he discovers this is much more than your average heist.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: Enter the “36th Chamber of the Shaolin” to a world of fast flying fists of fury!

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: From satirical comedies to intense dramas, these war movies capture the chaos, tragedy, and complexity of conflict.

programme.title: This Means War Vol. 2: The Fight for Freedom
programme.desc: Hollywood's greatest heroes fight history's greatest battles in this classic war film collection.

programme.title: Battle of Blood Island
programme.desc: Two American soldiers must put aside their differences in order to survive on a remote island after they are attacked by Japanese forces in World War II.

programme.title: This Means War Vol. 3: Triumph and Turmoil
programme.desc: Revisit an epic collection of war films that capture the bravery, sacrifice, and cost of conflict.

programme.title: This Means War Vol. 4: The Fog of War
programme.desc: These gripping war films explore the chaos, complexity, and moral ambiguity of conflict on the big screen.

programme.title: Best of the West Vol. 1
programme.desc: Return to the outlaw days of the Old West with classics starring Clint Eastwood, John Wayne, and more.

programme.title: God's Gun
programme.desc: A gunman (Jack Palance) makes a fatal mistake when he and his gang ravage a town and murder the local priest (Lee Van Cleef). Now, the priest’s twin brother vows revenge, and teams with a local boy (Leif Garrett) to bring the gunman and his gang to their knees. Lee Van Cleef played dual roles in this 1977 Spaghetti Western produced by Golan-Globus Productions.

programme.title: Best of the West Vol. 2
programme.desc: Saddle up as your favorite filmmakers talk beloved big screen Westerns!

programme.title: Clint Eastwood: Outlaw Spirit
programme.desc: From gunslingers to rebel heroes, Clint Eastwood brings grit, charm, and intensity in a way that no other movie star can.

programme.title: Chalrton Heston: Man of Monumental Movies
programme.desc: Take a look back at the epic adventures, timeless dramas, and groundbreaking sci-fi classics that defined Charlton Heston's career.

programme.title: ACTION- Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: Get rowdy with Big Trouble in Little China, Rambo, Dirty Harry, Mad Max, and more kick ass movies!

programme.title: ACTION- Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: Your favorite filmmakers discuss iconic cult classics The Warriors, Innerspace, and more!

programme.title: The Street Fighter
programme.desc: Sonny Chiba stars as a mercenary martial arts master who must protect an oil tycoon’s daughter from an army of murderous thugs.

programme.title: ACTION!!! Vol. 3
programme.desc: Hollywood filmmakers discuss Assault on Precinct 13, Sorcerer, Escape from New York, Runaway Train, and more.

programme.title: ACTION!!! Vol. 4
programme.desc: It's time to load up and throw down with these decade-spanning action favorites!

programme.title: The Return of the Street Fighter
programme.desc: Renegade martial arts warrior Sonny Chiba takes on the mob, the cops, and more in this sequel to The Street Fighter.

programme.title: ACTION!!! Vol. 5: Grit, Guns, and Getaways
programme.desc: These hard-hitting action flicks are packed with daring heists, gritty gunplay, and unforgettable heroes.

programme.title: ACTION!!! Vol. 6: Bold Movies and Big Attitude
programme.desc: A high-octane collection of tough-as-nails action flicks featuring iconic heroes, explosive chases, and unforgettable showdowns.

programme.title: The Thin Blue Line Vol. 1
programme.desc: From Bullitt to Bad Lieutenant, filmmakers discuss cops that kick ass on the big screen.

programme.title: The Thin Blue Line Vol. 2
programme.desc: From the past to the future, laying down the law comes easy to these big screen cops!

programme.title: Go Ahead, Make My Day
programme.desc: Five films. One legacy. Here's why Clint Eastwood's Harry Callahan is a Hollywood legend.

programme.title: Scorsese, Leone, and Larry Cohen
programme.desc: Three directors. Three unique styles. Three incredible legacies.

programme.title: Friedkin, De Palma, and Carpenter
programme.desc: Take a closer look at the classic films of William Friedkin, Brian De Palma, and John Carpenter.

programme.title: Crime Doesn't Pay Vol. 1: The Criminal Code
programme.desc: These heist and detective classics explore the moral ambiguity and dark psychology of the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Crime Doesn't Pay Vol. 2: Grit and Glory
programme.desc: It's an action bonanza of cops, robbers, and vengeance in these crime and exploitation hits.

programme.title: Crime Doesn't Pay Vol. 3: The Dark Side of Justice
programme.desc: Betrayal, justice, and moral complexity are on the menu in these moody and violent crime flicks.

programme.title: Gene Hackman's Greatest Hits
programme.desc: From "Bonnie and Clyde" to "The Royal Tenenbaums," these are the movies that made Gene Hackman a Hollywood legend.

programme.title: We Can Be Heroes
programme.desc: They're not all super, but these are the heroes that Hollywood needs right now.
